website_summaries.verdict: A fresh twist on the classic pump. The eye-turning asymmetrical strap actually helps keep your foot in the shoe. Great for special events or a work day where you spend at least some time sitting.
pros: Strap across the instep helps to keep the shoe on the foot
Slip-on, pointed-toe silhouette with asymmetrical strap across vamp
Lightly padded footbed, three-inch wrapped heel, and synthetic sole

customer_reviews.title: Dressy, feminine heel that’s more of a statement than your average pump
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in lieu of strappy sandals for an evening, semi-formal wedding. They’re cut narrow as I have narrow feet and I barely fit into the sides comfortably. I like the femininity of the pointy toe. However, the configuration of the cut-outs would make it very uncomfortable for anyone with wide feet or bunion issues because they start right at the junction where the foot bends, so it will dig into those areas. They fit true to size and the top band fits comfortably and is great for keeing the shoe from slipping off the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Prime fan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sexy, creamy beige leather
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sexy. I'm between sizes (6 to 6.5) but always order up with closed toe shoes especially pointy toes, which are gorgeous. I love these, bought in a 6.5 shown here with bare feet. Incredibly comfortable for a middle height but not super high heel. The leather is a creamy neutral color with a super important non-slip bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Idealist

customer_reviews.title: Double the fun!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable high heels I’ve ever worn! They fit true to size, the quality is excellent! I wear them for about eight hours at a time the end of the day my feet don’t hurt! I ordered the nude pair also! Compliments are common every time I step out!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Best dress shoe purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best dress shoe purchase ever! Normally I wear an 8 1/2, so that’s what I ordered. That pair cut into my foot right above the toes (I have a very high arch and high instep). The 9 would be too sloppy, if this was a traditional pump. However, the strap across the instep keeps the shoe securely on my foot. The shoe doesn’t slip , and I don’t walk out of them. The heel is high, but comfortable. I’m up and down all day—often walking a block or two at a stretch—I can finish my day without hobbling in pain. And, the style brings compliments all day, every day.
customer_reviews.author: L Howard

customer_reviews.title: The shoe itself is really nice, but unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is really nice, but unfortunately, they are extremely narrow so your feet come off the side of the shoe. All my shoes are medium, not wide, but unless your foot is extremely narrow, this won't really work. As far as size goes, they are true to size... no need to size up.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably elegant.
customer_reviews.text: These heels are extremely comfortable and are gorgeous. Just to let you know, I only wear heels 2-3 times a year. With this in mind, I was pleased and surprised to find that I was able to wear them for several hours. What makes them comfortable is that they have a comfortably padded insole. Weight distribution is equal, and not solely on the toe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I usually wear a 7.5, but they were out of stock. I had read reviews that mentioned the shoes ran a bit big, so I got a 7. They fit perfectly. I wore them to a back tie event and I am wearing them today at work. They are dressy enough to go fancy or business, which I love. I was on my feel for 4 hours and they didn't hurt my feet at all. I love the strap across the top of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: Fun, sexy, and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Ordered them and a few other pairs in a Prime Wardrobe box. These are the most comfortable heels I’ve ever owned. And they look fierce. Not just a plain old black heel. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: I really liked these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these shoes, stylish and confortable due to the heel size. They are narrow though. I have never had issues with narrow shoes, my feet are narrow too... these shoes barely fit me; I figure that most people would have a problem with these shoes not fitting.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I’m older so I can’t wear really high heels anymore without being in pain. These are shaped so they don’t hurt my ankles! I wouldn’t want to wear them for an entire day on my feet but they’re great for a few hours here and there. They fit really well too!!
customer_reviews.author: Normal Person

customer_reviews.title: After 5 short months of ownership and wearing just 6 times, the heel tip wore through to the metal.
customer_reviews.text: I am not typically one to spend a lot on shoes, and $88 is a lot for me. I had been experiencing discomfort with my inexpensive shoes from Kohls and thought to try a “better” brand. The shoe fit like a glove and was very comfortable. Imagine my disappointment when, after 5 short months of ownership and wearing just 6 times, the heel tip wore through to the metal.
customer_reviews.author: elliepel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Stable Heel
customer_reviews.text: Received this very nicely wrapped and quality seems really good. Nice leather smell. Strap holding your foot in creates additional stability. The heel itself is set a little to close to the inside of the foot in my opinion, though I tend to walk on the outside of my foot. I also own this shoe in black and the nude colour seems to be a little roomier - slightly wider in the toe box and the strap allows for a higher instep. Might be a difference in the type of leather used.
customer_reviews.author: Jessa

customer_reviews.title: tough fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide toe box w/ narrow heel. As I figured after reading the reviews, a 7.5 would be too narrow. Usually go up 1/2 size with pointy toes to accommodate that but the heel on the 8 was way too big. I was hoping the strap would hold my foot in but it does not. Heel slipped and there was no way to walk in them. Shame, its a very pretty shoe with not a terribly high heel that would have been great for work.
customer_reviews.author: Crazygirl35*

customer_reviews.title: Classy shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! If you a little bunion you may want a shoe stretcher gadget. I have to use one of those sometimes for one of my feet. Otherwise, nice shoe and comfy. In some shoes I wear 7.5. I ordered a 7 for this shoe. It was a perfect fit and doesn’t slide around. If you do not want to show toes but still need to be presentable, this is the shoe!
customer_reviews.author: TMC

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so cute, they're well made and beautiful.... but they SQUEAK! I tried multiple sizes and even a wide fit and the leather squeaks loudly when I walk. It is awful. I don't know if breaking them in would help, but I wasn't about to take the chance. I don't usually have this issue with shoes and own multiple pairs of CK. Very frustrating as these are really cute and the heel height is perfect for work.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been watching these pumps for about a year and when they went on sale ($70) I purchased them. Other reviewers said how comfortable they were and they are right. I stood/walked an entire day in them without difficulty. I am a standard size 9 and purchased same. I'm very happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to figure out how to get in touch with someone from Amazon but the soles fell off the second time i wore these. I took this photo a month ago which was a month after purchase. Saying that, i have 2 other pairs which are fine and i love the style but seems these soles were bad.
customer_reviews.author: Beesha

customer_reviews.title: Love the style of these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of these shoes! I had to get a 1/2 size bigger than I usually wear. This specific color, Desert Sand are darker than they appear in the picture; more of dark taupe
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, go with everything. True to size, true to color, non-slip soles. Classic Calvin Klein Pumps
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable for heels
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They're a little loose in the heel because I have weird shaped feet, but the crossover part keeps them on my feet. No blisters for me normally, but I wore them with stockings once and the slipperiness of the stockings made my feet move more and I did get a blister. I plan to avoid that in the future with either thicker stockings or hopefully I can find some with grip so my feet don't slide.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Approx 3.5 inch heel..So comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: High heels are not my typical go to but I could not resist these #calvins I absolutely love them. I am typically a 10W but these 10 M fit Perfectly❤❤🔥🔥They are so comfortable to walk in. I love them,,better than expected #winterlook coming soon... #calvinkleinshoes #calvinkleinjeans #calvinkleinblouse #thelanceteam #buckeyerealestate #arizonarealtor
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Lance

customer_reviews.title: Buy Them!
customer_reviews.text: I got them in Amazon Prime Wardrobe to try them out and they're beautiful and so unbelievably comfortable right out of the box. I've worn them a few times around the house to break them in, which there was no need to as they stayed comfortable. I love them and I'll keep checking for price drops to get them in another color....or two.
customer_reviews.author: WhatWouldLeiaDo

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoes just abit too loose
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact the it’s comfortable and fit the toe box very good and the heels size is great what I dislike is the width is too wide so therefore it’s loose wish I did just order a 10 instead a 10 wide I hope it doesn’t stretch any further though because I really like this shoes
customer_reviews.author: Kellykayblessed

customer_reviews.title: Patent leather Feel like rubber
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I bought patent leather but this feels like rubber. Beautiful Looking shoe, The price was good at $20, but that doesn’t matter if you can’t use them. This patent leather is not the quality I expected, and I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They look amazing and can be dressed up for a gala or down with jeans. Gave them 4 stars as they weren't extremely comfortable several hours into the first wear, but I'm hoping once they are broken in, they will maintain being as comfortable as the first time you put them on.
customer_reviews.author: P. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price! One shoe fell apart! See Picture of left & right shoe bottom.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 different colors of the beautiful Calvin Klein shoes. The black only cost $60 but I never thought they would fall apart on me. My left shoe practically crumbled in my hand. I was so shocked. 3 mos. old? I have $20 shoes that last way longer than that!! I can't return them but I can worn others!!
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are a very comfortable height, for the days you are not up to waking on stilts, but still want to look all dressed up. No breaking in period and the color us a true pastel with a little glitter. Lovely shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, touch snug
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute shoe. It is very comfortable to walk in. I originally purchased a 9, and had to return it and get a 9 wide. My foot wouldn't even go in... yikes. The 9 wide I can wear all day at work in the showroom but it is a little tight across the top of the foot. I am hoping with the real leather that this will soften over time but overall i am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Sablatzky

customer_reviews.title: Going to be my favorite shoe for all occassions
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting for this shoe to go on sale for an upcoming wedding and when they finally did, I snagged them. They look amazing and feel comfortable as well. The angle and height of the heel are super comfortable. I am considering getting in another color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Theoak80

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: The size chart was not mention size 5 or 5.5 so when I ordered 5.5 I found it big. The pump looks amazing but not happy about the size.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite heels ever
customer_reviews.text: I love shoes. Like really love shoes and these are my favorite ones of all time. They're absolutely beautiful, elegant, and so comfortable. I get compliments every time I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and painful if you stand for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: This high heels hurt my feet so bad! But I stood for a long time. Maybe if you don’t have to walk a lot, you won’t feel this much. To me, I bought two colors and I tried only black one and I couldn’t have this on at work again.
customer_reviews.author: MOONLIGHT_YUI

customer_reviews.title: Cute AND comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these shoes super cute on, they are shockingly comfortable! The heel isn’t too high either, just the right height!
customer_reviews.author: TB7

customer_reviews.title: Calvin kliend wide width review
customer_reviews.text: If you have broad feet will not recommend as although i purchased wide width it is still a narrow top so very uncomfortable. However excellent quality and very classy looking
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with ALL my wardrobe!
customer_reviews.text: Size 7, black, fit perfect! Love these shoes and have received many compliments! Very comfortable, can wear all day! Wear with dresses and jeans! My favorite heels!
customer_reviews.author: pD

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes. Leather is great the sole is non ...
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes. Leather is great the sole is non slip. Heel is perfect. From the first day they were amazing. I am trying to buy the cream in the same size but, not in stock. There is enough room for the toes even though the front has a point. The point is just right to give a amazing look with a dress, jeans or any outfit. Easy to put on as it has a little elastic stretch section on the side docent come off as you are walking.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Curcic-Daher

customer_reviews.title: Toe blister
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoe but I got my first blister on the toe next to my baby toe on both feet. Very painful and took forever to get better. Haven’t worn them again. 😕
customer_reviews.author: C. Austin

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Pair of Beautiful RED shoes
customer_reviews.text: I Love This Pair of Beautiful RED shoes. They fit me perfectly and are So Very Comfortable. I would definitely recommend this shoe. It is not to high but high enough for me. I can dress up or simply wear them with Jeans. I probably will check out other colors but Red is my Favorite❤️
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ostertag

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sexy heels.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a Christmas party and they were perfect. Made of high quality smooth leather. They fit my feet like a glove. And to top it off they are quite attractive. I received multiple compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2boys

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful😻
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous! The do run slightly large, but a size down would be too small. Just got little pads for the ball of my foot and that did the trick. High heel, but slightly cushioned instep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pair of shoes ever!!!! I can literally walk all day in these shoes. I have some problem foot areas, these shoes do not effect these sore spots. best purchase of all the shoes I have purchased this far!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this shoe
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty, I have not had a chance to wear these shoes because of Covid-19, but so looking forward to it. I love the look of this shoes and feel I can get a lot of use out of them. They can dress up a pair of jeans or wear them for a dressy night out. (when ever that will be. ha)
customer_reviews.author: Dion McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Comfy. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy. Just what I expected. I ordered the regular and wide. The wide ended up being too loose. I kept the regular.
customer_reviews.author: Mc_sac

customer_reviews.title: Buy these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! The heel is just high enough for someone who does not wear heels often. They are comfortable and gorgeous. I really enjoy wearing these shoes. Will probably order in black when my size becomes available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These stay on my fee quite nicely, I hate it when pumps are loose and floppy. Style is great and they are comfortable for a day at the office. I would NOT wear them to the market or for a day of walking, but, I don't wear heels that much so this is great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Toe width and balance
customer_reviews.text: The tow width was too small. The shoe front is not comfortable. With the high heel, the arch is awful. It hurts the back when you stand and walking with the heel . You need to have a comfortable sole and arch when you have heels like that. Shoe must not be that uncomfortable. I want to return it but I have worn it once. This is Calvin Klein!
customer_reviews.author: Sade Haas

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Klein Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They hug my feet. Great for dancing the night away. Another great Calvin Klein purchase and the color will go with just about color outfit.
customer_reviews.author: fifi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a busy work day
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, it’s getting harder to wear heels all day for work as I get older but these were perfect for a full work day filled with multiple meetings and getting around town. I plan to order a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Katie's Kindle

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were SO comfortable, it was shocking
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were SO comfortable, it was shocking. I wanted to keep them so bad just because of that. However, I couldn't find a way to wear them. The style looked too conservative with dresses, and too radical with pant suits. I couldn't make it work with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great to dress up a jeans outfit or to wear with suits, dresses, and skirts, comfortable, sleek and sexy!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this show. Traditional pumps fall off my feet so I'm always looking for something different. Paul Green makes beautiful, comfortable and durable shoes. This isn't as comfortable as the others I own. It could use a litttke more padding but it's still good for work and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love them but poor quality heel tip
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the shoe and even bought two pairs in different colors. HOWEVER, after only 2 times wearing them, the cap came off of the bottom of each heel and metal is showing. I didn’t wear them on gravel or rough terrain either. Just normal walking on sidewalks. Plus I’m over my return period by a few days. I’m sad.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla s.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the most comfortable high heels I’ve ever worn. They are absolutely beautiful. They’re just a smidge large, a very small amount not enough to go down a size. I may have to buy the other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Sarita.WRX

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Super comfortable and just the right height. Amazon was the lowest price I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit great and felt super comfy. I didn't keep them because I wasn't sure of the strap, but other than that I loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Photostar7980

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are comfortable and look absolutely stunning. The color is nice and goes with so many attires. I love to wear it with my dark blue suits. Loved it so much, just bought one for my mom as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Pure Comfort and Classy Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The ability to wear these shoes all day ranging anywhere from 9 to 10 hours is amazing. Compliments everytime they are on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cannuck

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Not too painful to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Like these a lot. I’m usually 10-11 in shoes. 11 is great. Not a heels girl, usually, but I can wear these for a few hours without wanting to cut my feet off.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rehm

customer_reviews.title: The best high heel I have ever owned! O
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! Is so comfortable I can wear to work all day and feet never hurt. I have it in three colors I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, heel was just the right fit for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Leather?
customer_reviews.text: Love style! Have recieved many compliments. 3 star rating is because they are listed as a “leather” shoe, but LEATHER UPPER isn’t marked inside the shoe. So I doubt the shoes are leather.
customer_reviews.author: Joni M.

customer_reviews.title: Defective shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are defective. They fit perfect and felt great but the bottoms fell apart within 2 weeks. Exchanged them for a new pair and they did the exact same thing. Missed the return window though so they’re now in the trash. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and classic.
customer_reviews.text: Reviews said the shoe ram narrow. For me it does not. It’s perfect. Extremely stylish. I adore this shoe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Cute AND Comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo cute!!! A little loose, I wear an 8, ordered a 7.5, fits.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Tizzi

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable heel for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable. I walk around three miles daily on them and I don't get sore feet!
customer_reviews.author: Mimiacs

customer_reviews.title: I loved this dressed pumps made me want to dress up to wear them
customer_reviews.text: Loved these heels. Super easy to walk it. Perfect for wide feet. I usually don’t wear heal because I seriously can’t walk in them. But this were perfect I even wore this with just jeans and a tee because I loved them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Taggart

customer_reviews.title: I wish they were a bit more comfortable since they are expensive shoes
customer_reviews.text: These fit very well. I wish they were a bit more comfortable since they are expensive shoes. I had to get inserts for them. They are very classy though and look great on.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Overall size
customer_reviews.text: I’m in LOVE with the shoes 😍 they are so elegant! I DEFINITELY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: EvePin

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very flattering shoe for leg. Unfortunately I needed a narrow and that was not available. I do have a narrow foot but can sometimes wear a medium in certain styles. Sad that I had to return. It seemed it would be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Loose around the ankle
customer_reviews.text: I like Calvin Klein pumps because of the comfort. However, they always burst at the side or the inner lining tears apart. I wear a 61/2 - 7 but for this style I decided to go 7 to combat this problem- bad idea! The Gella Pump is loose around the ankle area:(
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: For my work
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to use at the my office and they look really nice. Getting a little scratched on the shoe pointy part but good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mafer Tapia de Manzanero

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much, I have them in multiple colors. I get compliments every time I wear them. They are comfortable enough to walk around all day in them. A must have
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe for my daughter's wedding. Pretty and comfortable in a color that goes with a lot.
customer_reviews.author: S Powledge

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, wife loved them
customer_reviews.text: My wife love them! she's not easy to please with shoes. she loves to annoy me with many returns at all the time, but wasn't the case this time.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime S. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was really comfortable. I wore them to a wedding, which was 6+ hours and never wanted to take them off. They could be worn with a dress or pants.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Must have shoes !!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good looking. I have them in 3 colors. And they are super comfortable. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty shoes. Fit perfect. Heel is little high for everyday work, but, stunning for that special outfit.
customer_reviews.author: LoJoh

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good material and very comfortable and is a true fit! I wear a 7 1/2
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my sister and she love it,she said its a great fit,im happy i did.
customer_reviews.author: Clovalips

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: I got this shoe about a month ago. I wore it literally 5 times and this is what it looks like. I thought I could have gotten it repaired , unfortunately they were unable to do so... I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: T`Shura La Fond

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few to choose for a wedding, fabulous comfort all day and night.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: I have these in 3 colors; very comfy for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have these in 3 colors; very comfy for all day wear but they do wear out quickly. Nothing the shoe repair guy can’t fix !
customer_reviews.author: Jess D

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and can wear dressed up or even down
customer_reviews.text: Dont like the toe not being covered all the way and how you can see then. But the shield is comfy you can tell by the feeling while wearing the shoe it was made with comfort in mind. Black was my first choice but it was sold out
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes!! Just be aware, they run a little large.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Knapps

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish shoe
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes, they look so nice on my feet, and are incredibly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are absolutely gorgeous and sexy! Added bonus is they're very comfortable too!! I wouldn't hesitate to purchase in another color.
customer_reviews.author: TraceyB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty and comfy shoe. I rarely buy shoes online however the price was unbeatable and they are perfect for what I want to wear them with.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: if it fit would have been good. but there was also a flaw in my ...
customer_reviews.text: if it fit would have been good. but there was also a flaw in my pair where the right heel was not straight.
customer_reviews.author: stiff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Wore them to a wedding and danced the whole time- never had to take them off. They feel a bit tight when you get them so wear them around the house a bit to break them in. Really dressed up a plain black dress too.
customer_reviews.author: Trice

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable high heel ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable high heel I have ever worn! I wore them to my nieces’s wedding and danced all night without having to remove my shoes once! Yay me!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan McPartland

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: A tad bit larger, but still works well with an insert to take of some of the space in the shoes. Very stylish
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: A half size bigger would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This was a little snug. A half size bigger would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BelleTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Can’t wait until I can go somewhere in them!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute on, fits as expected just wish they weren’t made in China
customer_reviews.author: xRx products and design

customer_reviews.title: Amazing style and fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually skeptical when purchasing shoes online. However, these are beyond what I expected! They fit perfect (8 Wide) and couldn't be more happy with the style and craftsmanship! Thanks Calvin Klein!
customer_reviews.author: Wally3665

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is a good fit but it squeaks. I tried adjusting my foot. I changed floor surface but the squeak continues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Graceful Design
customer_reviews.text: Great special occasion shoe with a flattering line. I would wear these for any business or dressier occasion. It is not intended to be an all day shoe, so I plan to wear for certain outfits and occasions only.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Finds

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg my new favorite heels. These are beautiful & so comfortable!!! Now I want more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered black but I think nude may have been nicer. Fits ok, seems comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. they are smart looking, elegant and actually comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Loved them, but broken heel within 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved these and wore them 1-2 times a week, max. Really disappointed when the heel broke within 9 months of buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Women's Gella Pump
product_meta.description: Calvin Klein is a premier American designer famous for the birth of designer jeans. Known as "the supreme master of minimalism," Calvin Klein is one of the world's leading lifestyle design companies known for minimalist and functional aesthetics. The brand is modern, uniquely sophisticated and offers timeless style. Calvin Klein handbags are designed with clean, classic, and trendy silhouettes. They provide accessible luxury for today's consumer and are the perfect blend of contemporary sophistication.
feature_bullets: CALVIN KLEIN is a global lifestyle brand that exemplifies bold, progressive ideals and a seductive, and often minimal, aesthetic. We seek to thrill and inspire our audience while using provocative imagery and striking designs to ignite the senses.
STYLE AND DESIGN: Classic pointed toe pump with a 3 inch stiletto heel. Asymmetrical strap for optimal support and an extra touch of style. Finished with a Calvin Klein logo plate at back heel.
COMFORT: Flexible for extended wear, with signature gel pod inserts for comfort and support. A slip-resistant and weather proof sole provides shock absorption with every step.
PERFECT FIT: Find the perfect fit with extended size and width offerings; wide widths offered in classic colors 5W-11W. This style runs true to size.
